https://tmrev.io/movie/275860-Blues for Willadean 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6mLqDoPV60DSQM8mVbtrxUtSqVF.jpg The film adaptation of Del Shores' hit play. Under the thumb of her abusive husband, post-middle age Willadean feels life has passed her by until she makes some unlikely friends. Del Shores adapts this uplifting story from his play "The Trials and Tribulations of a Trailer Trash Housewife." Blues for Willadean
